A0: at least 20 health care workers at two Orlando hospitals
RelatedSentence: The unidentified 44 - year - old man has recovered from the virus and is now testing negative for Middle East respiratory syndrome , or MERS , they said .
Officials say at least 20 health care workers at two Orlando hospitals came into contact with the man , and they all have tested negative , too .
A man in Indiana was the first to be diagnosed in the U.S. with a case of the MERS virus , and an Illinois man picked up a MERS - related infection from that man .
